egi-ward.query: from Boundary BI left join fetch BI.children where upper(BI.boundaryType.name) = 'WARD' order by BI.id

egi-boundary.query: from Boundary BI order by BI.id

egi-accountCodes.query: from CChartOfAccounts c where c.classification=4 and c.type in('I'\,'A'\,'L') order by c.glcode

egi-function.query: from CFunction where isActive = true AND isNotLeaf=false order by upper(name)

egi-fund.query: from Fund where isactive = true and isnotleaf!=true order by upper(name)

egi-fundSource.query: from Fundsource where isactive=true order by upper(name)

egi-functionary.query: from Functionary where isactive=true order by upper(name)

egi-chartOfAccounts.query: select acc from CChartOfAccounts acc where acc.classification='4' and acc.isActiveForPosting=true order by acc.glcode

egi-subscheme.query: from SubScheme where isactive=true order by upper(name)

egi-coaPurposeId10.query: from CChartOfAccounts coa where purposeId = 10 order by glcode

egi-relationtype.query: from Relationtype order by id desc

egi-coaCodes.query: SELECT ID\,GLCODE FROM CHARTOFACCOUNTS WHERE CLASSIFICATION = 4 AND ISACTIVEFORPOSTING=true ORDER BY GLCODE

egi-activeCoaCodes.query: select glcode||'`-`'||name||'`-`'||ID as "code" from chartofaccounts where classification=4 and isActiveForPosting=true order by glcode

egi-coaCodesForLiability.query: select ca.id\, ca.glcode||'`-`'||ca.name as "code" from chartofaccounts ca where ca.ID in(select cd.glcodeID from chartofaccountdetail cd ) and ca.classification=4 and ca.type in('A'\,'L') and ca.isactiveforposting = true order by ca.glcode\,ca.type

egi-AllCoaCodesOfEarning.query: select ca.id\, ca.glcode||'`-`'||ca.name as "code" from chartofaccounts ca where ca.classification=4 and ca.type in('E') and ca.isactiveforposting = true order by ca.glcode\,ca.type

egi-partyTypeMaster.query: select id\, code as "typecode" from eg_partytype pt where pt.PARENTID is null order by code

egi-partyTypeAllChild.query: select id\, code as "typecode" from eg_partytype pt where pt.PARENTID is not null order by code

egi-typeOfWorkParent.query: select id\, code as "typecode" from egw_typeofwork tw where tw.PARENTID is null and PARTYTYPEID is not null order by code

egi-tdsType.query: select id\, type as "tdstype" from tds td where td.PARTYTYPEID is not null order by upper(type)

egi-activeFunctions.query: select name||'`-`'||id as "code" from function where isactive = true AND isnotleaf=false order by name

egi-egwTypeOfWork.query: from EgwTypeOfWork typeOfWork order by upper(code)

egi-egwSubTypeOfWork.query: from EgwTypeOfWork etw1 where etw1.parentid is null and etw1.id in (select etw2.parentid from EgwTypeOfWork etw2 where etw2.parentid = etw1.id) order by upper(code)

egi-dept.query: select id\,name from eg_department order by id desc

egi-recovery.query: from Tds tds where tds.isactive=true order by upper(type)

egi-activeFinYr.query: from CFinancialYear cfinancialyear where isActive=true order by id desc

egi-domain.query: SELECT ID\,NAME FROM EG_APPL_DOMAIN ORDER BY NAME

egi-domainwtoref.query: SELECT ID\,NAME FROM EG_APPL_DOMAIN WHERE ID NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT APPL_DOMAINID FROM EG_ATTRIBUTETYPE) ORDER BY NAME

egi-locationparent.query: from Location where locationId is null order by name

egi-liabilityCOACodes.query: select ca.id\, ca.glcode||' : '||ca.name from chartofaccounts ca where ca.classification=4 and ca.type in('L') and ca.isActiveForPosting=true order by ca.glcode

egi-hierarchyType.query: SELECT ID_HEIRARCHY_TYPE\,TYPE_NAME FROM EG_HEIRARCHY_TYPE ORDER BY ID_HEIRARCHY_TYPE

egi-locationparent.query: from Location where locationId is null order by name
